atom.name: 0x00000001
atom.value: <![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE ilm-specification SYSTEM "bycast-ilm.dtd"><ilm-specification name="Baseline 2 Copies Policy" id="00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000" version="1.0"><topology><pool id="p1" label="All Storage Nodes"><disk/></pool></topology><rules><rule id="p1_r2" label="Make 2 Copies" default="yes" version="1.0" schema-version="1.0"><baseline><ingest/></baseline><filter label="Filter 1"/><epoch start="0"><place pool="p1">2</place></epoch></rule></rules></ilm-specification>]]>
